main event: On the night of November 17, 1952, Mr. John Doe reported seeing a bright light moving rapidly across the sky in Florence, S.C.
interesting points: The reported object was estimated to be at an altitude of approximately 5,000 feet., Mr. Doe described the object as round or disc-shaped and emitting no sound., A local investigation was initiated by the authorities but yielded no further information., Witnesses included several qualified observers at Florence Municipal Airport., The object was observed traveling from north to south at a very high rate of speed.
sighted object: a bright light moving in the sky
witness description: Mr. John Doe, resident of Florence, S.C.
